articles.author: Christine Idzelis, Vivien Lou Chen, William Watts, Joseph Adinolfi, Joy Wiltermuth, Barbara Kollmeyer, Steve Goldstein
articles.title: Stock Market on Aug. 8, 2025: Dow and S&P 500 close up, Nasdaq books record high as major U.S. equities benchmarks see weekly gains - MarketWatch
articles.description: The tech-heavy Nasdaq clinched another record closing high on Friday, with U.S. stocks booking weekly gains as investors weighed corporate earnings.

articles.author: Jon Brodkin
articles.title: Google Gemini struggles to write code, calls itself “a disgrace to my species” - Ars Technica
articles.description: Google still trying to fix “annoying infinite looping bug,” product manager says.
